title: New York State of Mind
description: ****ATTENTION: Although written at first for the YA audience, this book does have one sex scene it. Therefore, I recommend that only YA's 17 or older read this book. Parents, if you have teenagers, I would recommend reading this book first and deciding if you think it is appropriate for them. It may not be appropriate for YA's under the age of 16.*****Carrie lives on Earth in the year 3120. There has been life discovered on three other planets: Venus, Mars and Jupiter. For a time, all was well with the planets. They had an alliance. Then things changed. There was an interplanetary war. Now, Mars and Earth find themselves pitted in a war against Venus and Jupiter.Carrie and her boyfriend, Flynn, are trying whatever they can to save the earth, save her family and get out of here alive. They might just get more than they bargained for.***This book is the first in a two part series. It has a cliffhanger. So, when you read this book, be prepared, you will have to wait to find out what happens next.***
author: Maggie Stewart
